description:
Kuroiwa Takeomi is a Rank 2 Investigator, and member of Team Hirako. He is the son of Special Class http://anidb.net/ch72813 [Kuroiwa Iwao], and considered to be an exceptionally gifted young Investigator. Kuramoto notes that he is among the 0.01% of humans that possesses physical strength above normal human limitations, and can therefore actually fight ghouls unarmed.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kuroiwa Takeomi
